articles.title: BCG Vaccine Not Effective Against COVID-19, Other Respiratory Infections in Older Adults - Infectious Disease Advisor
articles.description: Researchers assessed whether the Bacille Calmette-Guérin tuberculosis vaccine could protect older adults from COVID-19 and other respiratory tract infections.
